text: In a network, Host A and Host B are connected through Routers R1 and R2. Which of the following statements is/are true? (a) If A sends an IP datagram to B, the value of the TTL field cannot be less than 3 for the successful delivery of data. (b) If A sends an IP datagram to B, the destination address in the IP and the MAC headers will be that of R1 (c) If A sends a datagram to B through R1 and ICMP redirect is received, Host A, R1 and R2 are all on the same LAN segment. (d) Host A sends a datagram to Host B with TTL set to 1, it will receive an ICMP error message with Destination Unreachable.
